com.risk.model

Class PlayersWorldDomination

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • com.risk.model.PlayersWorldDomination
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PlayersWorldDomination
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.io.Serializable
    Observable PlayerWorldDomination class, display 1) the percentage of the map controlled by every player 2) the continents controlled by every player 3) the total number of armies owned by every player
    See Also:
